backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user registration, profile management, package/payment CRUD, admin stats, payment proof submission with blob storage, role-based access control, and user blocking functionality.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining type schemas for UserProfile, Package, Payment, PaymentProof and OldActor state, with a run function that currently returns the old actor unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: Skills Bazzar logo replacement, PaymentGateway component with bank details, payment proof submission form, and payment modal integration with PricingSection.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, authentication, landing page sections, user/admin dashboards, and payment flow components with Skills Bazzar branding.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining emerald green and black theme variables for both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, Open Graph, and Twitter card metadata for Evergreen Hub affiliate marketing website.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router setup defining routes for landing page, authentication, contact, user dashboard, and admin dashboard with QueryClient and AuthProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageModal: Dialog modal component for displaying full-size payment screenshot images in the admin interface with responsive sizing and close functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/PackageMod: Modal dialog component for creating and editing course packages with form fields for name, price, and courses; uses React Query mutations to call backend actor methods.
Sticky countdown timer banner displaying a 24-hour countdown with emerald green styling to create urgency for limited-time offers.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Displays a collapsible FAQ accordion section with five common questions about affiliate marketing, experience requirements, results timeline, support options, and earning potential.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Renders a fixed floating button in the bottom-right corner that opens WhatsApp with a pre-filled message to contact +919263989760.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays the site footer with brand info, social media links (YouTube, Instagram, WhatsApp), contact details, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the sticky header with logo/brand, navigation, and authentication UI showing login/register buttons for guests or a dropdown menu with dashboard/admin links and logout for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the main hero section with background image, Evergreen Hub branding, headline about online earning, and CTA buttons to buy courses or chat on WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/InstagramSection: Promotes the Instagram account @rajput.rudra_s with gradient styling, Instagram logo, and buttons to follow or connect on the platform.
frontend/src/components/PaymentGateway.t: Displays India Post Payment Bank account details (account number, IFSC, holder name) and payment instructions for bank transfer in a styled card layout.
frontend/src/components/PaymentModal.tsx: Modal dialog for completing course purchases that shows package details, payment gateway info, and a form to submit payment proof with transaction ID and screenshot using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/PaymentProofForm: Form component for users to submit payment proof with transaction ID and screenshot upload, includes file validation (image type, 5MB max), upload progress tracking, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Displays six course packages (E-LITE to ULTRA PRO, ₹699-₹14999) with pricing cards, course lists, and buy buttons that trigger PaymentModal for authenticated users or redirect to login.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that checks authentication and admin privileges, redirects unauthorized users to login, and shows loading state during initialization.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Static testimonials section displaying three student success stories with 5-star ratings, avatars, and quotes about their experience with Evergreen Hub.
frontend/src/components/VideoEditingSect: Marketing section promoting professional long video editing service at ₹500 per video with a WhatsApp contact button for ordering.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsSecti: Static benefits section showcasing four key features (beginner-friendly training, step-by-step guidance, lifetime access, WhatsApp support) with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeSection.t: YouTube channel promotion section with embedded video player, channel link (@evergreengamerz), and subscribe button that opens the channel in a new tab.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Authentication context provider that manages user identity, profile, admin status, and login/logout flows using Internet Identity and backend actor; provides auth state to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control with admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login status, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including primary, secondary, muted, destructive, and chart color definitions.
frontend/src/layouts/AdminDashboardLayou: Admin dashboard layout with protected routing, responsive sidebar navigation for stats/users/packages/payments, and logout functionality; requires admin authentication.
frontend/src/layouts/UserDashboardLayout: User dashboard layout with protected routing, responsive sidebar navigation for dashboard/packages/profile/password, and logout functionality; requires user authentication.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminStats.tsx: Admin dashboard statistics page displaying total users, sales, revenue, and pending payments in card widgets with auto-refresh.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PackageManageme: Admin interface for managing course packages with CRUD operations, status toggling, and a table view of all packages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PaymentManageme: Admin page for managing payment proofs with filtering by status, viewing screenshots, and approving/rejecting submissions. Displays payment details in a table with user and package information.
Admin page for managing users with search functionality, ability to toggle user block status, and delete users. Displays user information including name, email, phone, role, and status in a table.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity and verifies admin role before granting access to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying WhatsApp and phone contact options with a call-to-action for starting the affiliate marketing journey.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: User login page that authenticates via Internet Identity with remember-me option and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Register.tsx: Registration page with form validation that authenticates via Internet Identity and registers user details (name, email, phone) with the backend.
frontend/src/pages/user/ChangePassword.t: Informational page explaining that password management is handled through Internet Identity authentication system, not traditional passwords. Provides guidance on managing authentication credentials.
frontend/src/pages/user/DashboardOvervie: User dashboard displaying overview statistics including total packages, total spent, pending payments, and approved payments. Shows recent payment proofs with status badges.
frontend/src/pages/user/MyPackages.tsx: User page displaying all purchased packages with payment status, transaction IDs, and pricing information. Shows empty state when no packages have been purchased.
User profile settings page allowing users to update their name and phone number. Email field is displayed but disabled as it cannot be changed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, font families (Inter), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for Evergreen Hub affiliate marketing website, tracking implemented features including hero section, 6-tier pricing packages, YouTube integration, video editing services, WhatsApp lead generation, and authentication system with green/black theme.
